value.title: Why you should look at Azure Synapse Analytics!
value.excerpt: Have you heard about Azure Synapse Analytics! Is your data in Synapse? It's so much more than SQL Server! Adam and Patrick look at why you should care about it!  What is Azure Synapse Analytics? https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/synapse-analytics/overview-what-is  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: Filter Context in DAX
value.excerpt: Understanding the difference between a row context and a filter context is the first and most important concept to learn to use DAX correctly. This video introduces the filter context. Article and download: https://sql.bi/747800?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The

value.title: 20 tricks to finally master the Matrix visualization in Power BI!!
value.excerpt: The matrix visualization has over 100 configuration options, and some of the most basic functionality, like hiding subtotals is not so easy to discover.  In today's video, I will show you 20 things you can do on the matrix that will take that visualization to the next level.  Did I miss any? Let me know

value.title: Avoid refresh errors when importing files in Power BI
value.excerpt: Have you refreshed Power BI files and got errors due to missing columns or unwanted columns? Here I show you how to avoid new columns for getting added and refresh error from missing columns.  I learnt this by watching Microsoft Power BI webinar with Chris Webb: https://info.microsoft.com/CO-PowerBI-WBNR-FY16-06Jun-21-Amazing-Things-with-Power-BI-Registration.html?Is=Website

value.title: Building relationships between tables when both have duplicates
value.excerpt: PowerPivot and Power BI Desktop only allow the creation of relationships between tables when one of columns forming the relationship does not have duplicate values.  In order to relate these two tables to one another, what we need is a third table with all distinct values from both tables. In this tutorial

value.title: Concatenate/ Merge columns with Power Query, the right way.
value.excerpt: Concatenating columns in Power Query is not hard to do, but depending on the technique you use, you might get unexpected or wrong results.  There is a bullet proof way to do it and I will explain it here.  Link to the null, blank video mentioned in this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EoRjNx1G2g4

value.title: 2 ways to reduce your Power BI dataset size and speed up refresh
value.excerpt: Adam shows you two things to reduce your Power BI dataset size. These are both things he commonly sees with Power BI reports and could potentially save you a lot of space and improve refresh times along with report performance.  Data reduction techniques for import modeling: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/guidance/import-modeling-data-reduction

value.title: Looking at Power BI Many to Many

value.title: What is this delta lake thing?
value.excerpt: You may be using a lake for your data and it may just be regular parquet files. In this video, Stijn joins us to explain why you should be using a delta lake instead and how this works in Azure Synapse Analytics.  Connect with Stijn https://twitter.com/SQLStijn  What is Delta Lake https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/synapse-analytics/spark/apache-spark-what-is-delta-lake

value.title: Power BI Apps for multiple audiences has arrived!
value.excerpt: This has been a feature that has been asked for long time! The ability to control who can see what content within a published Power BI App! You can now serve up multiple audiences within a single app.  Announcing Public Preview of Multiple Audiences for Power BI Apps https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/announcing-public-preview-of-multiple-audiences-for-power-bi-apps/
